title: LoL Account transfer update
body: Any update on account transfer status? It's been 5-6 weeks already.

replies.body: Like Bladenite mentioned, we recently got a better update on the status of those transfers over in the [stickied post by HollyMonster](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update)!

Howdy corelion,

The Transfer Service should be back up and running by late January/early February.

I suggest you keep an eye on this [Boards Post](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update), it will be actualized once there is more news.

Sincerely
-Bladenite
